original_text: But if ye shall at all turn from following me, ye or your children, and will not keep my commandments and my statutes which I have set before you, but go and serve other gods, and worship them:
korean_text: 만일 너희나 너희의 자손이 아주 돌아서서 나를 따르지 아니하며 내가 너희 앞에 둔 나의 계명과 법도를 지키지 아니하고 가서 다른 신을 섬겨 그것을 경배하면

sentences.original_text: But if ye shall at all turn from following me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희가 나를 따르는 것에서 돌아서면

sentences.original_text: and will not keep my commandments and my statutes
which I have set before you
but go and serve other gods
